ARGUMENT
p s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-mnc | |- Monic = ( s e. ~P CC |-> { p e. ( Poly ` s ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dmmptss | |- dom Monic C_ ~P CC |
| 3 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( P e. ( Monic ` S ) -> S e. dom Monic ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sseldi | |- ( P e. ( Monic ` S ) -> S e. ~P CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_elpwid | |- ( P e. ( Monic ` S ) -> S C_ CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_plybss | |- ( P e. ( Poly ` S ) -> S C_ CC ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ ( ( coeff ` P ) ` ( deg ` P ) ) = 1 ) -> S C_ CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnex | |- CC e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( S e. ~P CC <-> S C_ CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( Poly ` s ) = ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_rabeq | |- ( ( Poly ` s ) = ( Poly ` S ) -> { p e. ( Poly ` s ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } = { p e. ( Poly ` S ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( s = S -> { p e. ( Poly ` s ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } = { p e. ( Poly ` S ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Poly ` S ) e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rabex | |- { p e. ( Poly ` S ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } e. _V |

| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_sylbir | |- ( S C_ CC -> ( Monic ` S ) = { p e. ( Poly ` S ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } ) |

| 18 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( p = P -> ( coeff ` p ) = ( coeff ` P ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( p = P -> ( deg ` p ) = ( deg ` P ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( p = P -> ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = ( ( coeff ` P ) ` ( deg ` P ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( p = P -> ( ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 <-> ( ( coeff ` P ) ` ( deg ` P ) ) = 1 ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_elrab | |- ( P e. { p e. ( Poly ` S ) | ( ( coeff ` p ) ` ( deg ` p ) ) = 1 } <-> ( P e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ ( ( coeff ` P ) ` ( deg ` P ) ) = 1 ) ) |
